Title: Conflict of Interest
Writer: Bradley Alexander (creator), Carolyn Alexander (creator), Carolyn Alexander (story), Susan-Sojourna Collier (screenplay), Susan-Sojourna Collier, Thomas Mikal Ford (story)
Actors: Jazsmin Lewis, Thomas Mikal Ford, Bria L. Murphy, Viviane Brazil
Plot: This soul- stirring story about love, betrayal and forgiveness reveals that family is God's most precious gift to us.
